name: discord-movienight
excerpt: Experience Discord Movienight with a Java bot using Javacord & Maven, managing movie lists and data from OMDB API. Integrate ChatGPT for engaging conversations and Adam Sandler-style interactions.
description:
Discord Movie Night with Java Bot

This Discord bot is programmed in Java, utilizing the Javacord library and Maven for project management.

The bot's main functionality is to maintain a 'to-watch' list of movies that a Discord server community is interested in watching.

It fetches movie data from the OMDB API and saves this information in .json files, storing data both per server and in a cache file for quick access to recently requested movie information.

Incorporating ChatGPT technology through sashirestela's simple-openai library, the bot is capable of engaging users in conversation, adopting the persona of Adam Sandler. Additionally, this integration allows the bot to generate custom remarks regarding planned movie events and more.
